# isEligible

**Type Property**

A property that indicates whether the current system supports card session functionality.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isEligible: Bool { get async }
```

## Discussion

Query this property before calling [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/CardSession/init()] to avoid showing a system card session UI on ineligible devices.

## Determining card session availability

- **isSupported**: A property that indicates whether the current device supports card session functionality.
